title: Does the season restart at 12am or 8am?
body: Just for clarification does teh season restart at 12am or after 8am

replies.body:
in the morning sometime
"Update - Ranked will be going down as usual in the early hours tomorrow morning 21/01/2015 and then the deploy will start. We are aiming to have it back online for you with the new season later in that the morning of 21/01/2015."
